        public CompletionStage<Optional<URI>> locate(String name,

        Description copied from interface: ServiceLocator
        Locate a service with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the service.
        serviceCall - The service call descriptor that this lookup is for.
        Returns:
        The URI for that service, if it exists.
